name: Draw Your Game
description: “I wish I could make my own video game.” Who among us hasn't thought that at some point? Draw Your Game is a user-friendly application allowing anyone and everyone to create their own video game in a few steps!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron N3450 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500 Storage: 1 GB available space
